name: NFDI4Health_LM_Metadataschema_RL_V3_1
title: NFDI4Health LM Record Linkage Metadataschema (UC 5.3) V3.1
description: NFDI4Health LogicalModel Record Linkage Metadataschema (Use Case 5.3) V3.1

mapping.name: NFDI4Health Record Linkage Metadataschema Version 3.1 Mapping to internal numbering of Metadataschema Version 3.1

element.short: NFDI4Health LM Record Linkage Metadataschema (UC 5.3) V3.1
element.definition: NFDI4Health LogicalModel Record Linkage Metadataschema (Use Case 5.3) V3.1
Group of items providing information on record linkage
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..*, if Resource.resourceDesign.dataSharingPlan.recordLinkage == 'Yes'; otherwise 0.. 0 / Display information? (Data capturing): yes / Display information? (Data visualization): yes / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.3 requirements

element.short: Is there a specific legal regulation/permission for record linkage?
element.definition: Indication whether there is a specific regulations/permission for record linkage.
element.comment: Additional Information: Whether any specific legal regulations/permissions exist (e.g. as for social data, as for cancer registry data or hospital data). / Display information? (Data capturing): yes / Display information? (Data visualization): yes / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.3 requirements

element.short: Please indicate which specific legal basis allows for record linkage
element.definition: Information specifying which specific legal basis allows for record linkage.
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..1, if RecordLinkage.legalBasis == 'Yes'; otherwise 0..0 / Additional Information: If existing, any specific legal regulations/permissions (e.g. as for social data, as for cancer registry data or hospital data) / Display information? (Data capturing): yes / Display information? (Data visualization): yes / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.3 requirements

element.short: Has an informed consent been obtained to allow the linkage?
element.definition: Indication whether an informed consent that allows record linkage has been obtained.
element.comment: Display information? (Data capturing): yes / Display information? (Data visualization): yes / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.3 requirements

element.short: Who are the responsible institutions and authorities who must agree to the record linkage?
element.definition: Institutions and authorities that must agree to the record linkage.
element.comment: Display information? (Data capturing): yes / Display information? (Data visualization): yes / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.3 requirements

element.short: Are there additional costs for record linkage?
element.definition: Indication whether there are additional costs for record linkage.
element.comment: Display information? (Data capturing): yes / Display information? (Data visualization): yes / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.3 requirements

element.short: Which identifiers can be used for record linkage?
element.definition: Identifiers that can be used for record linkage (e.g. names, date of birth, zip code, insurance number or control number as in cancer registries).
element.comment: Display information? (Data capturing): yes / Display information? (Data visualization): yes / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.3 requirements

element.short: Please indicate any further details possibly important for conducting the record linkage
element.definition: Further important details for conducting the record linkage
element.comment: Display information? (Data capturing): yes / Display information? (Data visualization): yes / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.3 requirements

element.short: Please indicate additional related resouces specific to record linkage
element.definition: DOIs of record linkage example resources (e.g., publications).
element.comment: Additional Information: Please do not repeat those already entered in the section 'Related resources'/ Display information? (Data capturing): yes / Display information? (Data visualization): yes / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.3 requirements
